title: Classifying Client Type using Client Names
description: The methods used to generate the filter terms involved looking at the most frequent words/client names for clues about what types of establishments were mentioned in this data set. Developing the filters took a fair amount of "human" sleuthing while looking at TF-IDF scores, frequency counts of Client names, as well as just general knowledge of common Spanish words used to refer to certain establishment types. Especially with all the noise provided by the Clients referred to only by a proper name, the filtered data is a proportionally small figure- but, significant.
